Contribute to This Week on HTMX

"I found a mistake!"
The Week is written in a GitHub repo. You can find the post in question and edit it directly on GitHub or open an issue for us to look at.
"You should run this story!"
Open an issue on our repository, or email the editor (deniz+thisweek@denizaksimsek.com).
"I can write this week's post!"
Should you find the time, do not hesitate to ask to write for the Week! Send an email to deniz+thisweek@denizaksimsek.com or find me on the HTMX Discord (Deniz Akşimşek#4014).
"Someone should get paid for this!"
That someone could be you! Wait, no, I meant me... You could do the paying.

Support me on XYZ!
